lead_paragraph: Michal Neuvirth, Thomas Greiss and Martin Jones were sitting on the bench as playoff backups a year ago. Jeff Zatkoff and Matt Murray were in the minors.

headline.print_headline: Surprise Goaltenders Make Big Impacts on Playoffs' 1st Round
headline.main: Surprise Goaltenders Make Big Impacts on Playoffs' 1st Round
